TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 文字方塊控制項。

span.span: Represents a Windows text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與控制項，使用者也可以在應用程式中輸入文字。With the control, the user can enter text in an application. 這個控制項具有標準 Windows 文字方塊控制項，包括多行編輯與密碼字元遮罩中找不到的其他功能。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking. 一般而言，控制項用來顯示，或接受做為輸入，單行文字。Typically, a control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text. 您可以使用和屬性，以啟用多行顯示，或輸入的文字。You can use the and properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 設定和屬性`true`啟用更多行中的文字操作控制項。Set the and properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline control. > [!NOTE] > 您必須設定屬性`true`調整的高度控制項。You must set the property to `true` to adjust the height of the control. 您可以設定來調整高度屬性。You can adjust the height by setting the property. 您可以限制輸入的文字數量藉由設定控制屬性設為特定數目的字元。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 控制項也可用來接受密碼和其他機密資訊。 controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information. 您可以使用遮罩字元版本的控制項會單行中輸入的屬性。You can use the property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control. 使用屬性，讓使用者只輸入大寫、 僅小寫或大寫和小寫字元的組合控制項。Use the property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 視窗的內容捲動內控制項的可見區域資料指標 （插入號） 之前，您可以使用方法。To scroll the contents of the until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the method. 若要選取文字範圍的文字方塊中，您可以使用方法。To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the method. 若要限制從輸入中的文字控制項時，您可以建立事件處理常式事件，以驗證輸入控制項中的每個字元。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 您也可以限制資料中的所有項目藉由設定控制屬性`true`。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 大部分的功能控制項都繼承自類別。Most of the functionality of the control is inherited from the class. > > 使用控制項啟用視覺化樣式會導致不正確處理 surrogate 字型。Using the control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 這個範例會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父容器控制項定義的色彩和字型設定。The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體控制，並將字串指派給控制項的屬性。The following code example creates a new instance of the control and assigns a string to the control's property. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.TextBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.TextBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsReturn { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在多行 控制項中按 ENTER 時，是否會在控制項中建立新行文字或啟動表單的預設按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果 ENTER 鍵在控制項的多行版本中建立新的文字行，則為 ，如果 ENTER 鍵啟動表單的預設按鈕，則為 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值為`false`，使用者必須按 CTRL + ENTER 在多行中建立新的一行控制項。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果沒有任何表單的預設按鈕，ENTER 鍵一律會建立新的一行文字在控制項中，不論這個屬性的值。If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 這個範例會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ AutoCompleteCustomSource { System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteStringCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當 屬性設定為 時所使用的自訂 。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom to use when the property is set to .
A to use with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和屬性來建立自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適用於所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此範例會執行下列動作：This example does the following: - 使用屬性來啟用控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用屬性來設定自訂值的清單。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/vb/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode AutoCompleteMode { System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::AutoCompleteMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定選項，控制如何在 中使用自動完成。

span.span: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the .
One of the values of .
The following are the values.

value.span: 將最可能的候選字串其餘部分附加至現有字元，並反白顯示附加的字元。

span.span: Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.

value.span: 顯示與編輯控制項相關的輔助下拉式清單。

span.span: Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.

value.span: 一或多個建議完成字串會填入這個下拉式清單。

span.span: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
Appends both and options.
Disables automatic completion.
This is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和屬性來建立自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適用於所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 作業系統可能會限制可同時顯示的自訂字串數目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此範例會執行下列動作：This example does the following: - 使用屬性來啟用控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用屬性來設定自訂值的清單。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/cs/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.textbox.autocompletecustomsource/vb/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和屬性來建立自動完成輸入的字串比較輸入中維護的來源的所有字串的前置詞的前置詞。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 這適用於所在 Url、 地址、 檔案名稱或命令會經常輸入的控制項。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用屬性是選擇性的但是您必須設定屬性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 您必須使用和屬性放在一起。You must use the and properties together. > [!NOTE] > 在多行上無法運作控制項。 does not work on multiline controls. > [!NOTE] > 作業系統可能會限制可以同時顯示的自訂字串數目。The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合做為，自動完成的自訂來源控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a collection as the auto-complete custom source for a control. 此範例會執行下列動作：This example does the following: - 使用屬性來啟用控制項來接受自動完成行為的自訂來源。Uses the property to enable the control to accept a custom source for its auto-complete behavior. - 使用屬性來設定自訂值的清單。Uses the property to set the custom list of values. - 使用屬性來設定自動完成的候選項目顯示的方式。Uses the property to set how the auto-complete candidates are displayed. summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項是否在輸入字元時修改字元的大小寫。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值，指定 控制項是否修改字元的大小寫。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the control modifies the case of characters.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來變更所需的應用程式的字元的大小寫。You can use the property to change the case of characters as required by your application. 例如，您可以變更的所有輸入的字元大小寫密碼項目為大寫或小寫來強制執行密碼原則所用的控制項。For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立用來接受密碼的控制項。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 這個範例會使用屬性來變更類型的所有字元大小寫，而屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此範例也會使用屬性中心中的密碼控制項。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不在列舉型別 (Enumeration) 有效值範圍內的值會指派給這個屬性。

span.span: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行 控制項。

span.span: if the control is a multiline control; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在多行上無法運作控制項。 does not work on multiline controls. 變更字型時，未顯示您已定義任何縮排。When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear. 若要取得縮排，設定至`true`並覆寫 WM_SETFONT，而不需要呼叫基底類別，以便 SETMARGINS 則不會呼叫。To get indentation, set to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 這個範例會使用， ，和屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。This example uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.AcceptsReturn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBackColorChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnBackColorChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnFontChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnFontChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者選取的文字控制項，控制項儲存選取項目。When the user selects text in a control, the control saves the selection. 當控制項取得焦點，選取項目時相同失去焦點。When a control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the loses focus. 當取得焦點放在第一次，、 選取整個文字。When the gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PasswordChar { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在單行 控制項中用來遮罩密碼字元的字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line control.

value.span: 用來遮罩在單行 控制項中已輸入字元的字元。

span.span: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line control.

value.span: 如果您不想要控制項在輸入字元時遮罩它們，請設定這個屬性值為 0 (字元值)。

span.span: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
Equals 0 (character value) by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的優先順序高於屬性。The property has precedence over the property. 每當設`true`、 使用預設系統密碼字元，以及所設定的任何字元會被忽略。Whenever the is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by is ignored. 當屬性設定，使用鍵盤在控制項中的剪下和複製動作無法執行。When the property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當是密碼模式中，因為， ，或是`true`、為限制模式。When the is in password mode because , , or is `true`, the is in restricted mode. 在此模式中，已停用，但目前快取，因此它可以還原如果萬一不受限制。In this mode, the is disabled, but the current is cached so that it can be restored if the ever becomes unrestricted. 切換是常見的案例。Toggling the is a common scenario. 控制項在受限制的模式時，會加上陰影。The is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode. 從設計工具的觀點來看，值顯示為實際值。From the designer perspective, the value shown is the actual value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立用來接受密碼的控制項。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 這個範例會使用若要變更所有字元的屬性型別為小寫字母和屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此範例也會使用屬性中心中的密碼控制項。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The text to replace.

summary.span: 將所選文字設為所指定的文字，而不清除復原緩衝區。

span.span: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於設定，不會影響剪貼簿。Unlike setting , does not affect the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);

Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef m As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean

span.span: A , passed by reference that represents the window message to process.

param.span: 其中一個 值，表示要處理的快速鍵。

span.span: One of the values that represents the shortcut key to process.

summary.span: 處理命令按鍵。

span.span: Processes a command key.

returns.span: 如果命令鍵已由控制項處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 4.6.1 的新。New in 4.6.1. 在舊版中的 Ctrl A 快速鍵無法選取所有文字時和屬性已設為同時`true.`。In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a failed to select all text when the and properties were both set to `true.`. 這個方法可讓 CTRL-A 攠摝坫選取所有文字時和屬性都設定為 `true.`This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the and properties are both set to `true.` 以.NET Framework 版本 4.0 到 4.6 為目標的應用程式可以利用此方法加入至下列``app.config 檔的區段：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` 應用程式的目標為.NET framework 4.6.1 或更新版本可以藉由新增下列命令以取消這個行為``app.config 檔的區段：Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `` section of the app.config file: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果 app.config 檔已經包含`AppContextSwitchOverrides`機碼、 新的金鑰值合併至現有的索引鍵。If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key. 例如，``。For example, ``.

permission.span: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

span.span: for operating with unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars ScrollBars { System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ScrollBars value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在多行 控制項中應該顯示的捲軸。

span.span: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline control.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值，指出多行 控制項是顯示為沒有捲軸、有水平捲軸、有垂直捲軸，還是兩者都有。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 水平捲軸不會顯示如果屬性設定為`true`，不論值的屬性。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立多行具有垂直捲軸控制項。The following code example creates a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此範例也會使用， ，和屬性，使多行適用於建立文字文件的控制項。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline control useful for creating text documents. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.ScrollBars Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment TextAlign { System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::HorizontalAlignment value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在 控制項中文字的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a control.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值，指出在控制項中文字的對齊方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來對齊文字方塊以符合您的表單上的文字版面配置。You can use this property to align the text within a to match the layout of text on your form. 例如，如果您的控制項都位於右側的表單，您可以設定屬性`HorizontalAlignment.Right`，和的文字對齊右邊的控制項，而不是預設值靠左對齊。For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立用來接受密碼的控制項。The following code example creates a control that is used to accept a password. 這個範例會使用屬性來變更類型的所有字元大小寫，而屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to lowercase, and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此範例也會使用屬性中心中的密碼控制項。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. [!code-cpp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TextBox.CharacterCasing Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event TextAlignChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值已變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您找出事件發生，可協助您偵錯時。This report helps you find out when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#249](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#249)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#249](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#249)]

value.span: 如果 控制項中的文字應顯示為預設的密碼字元，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the text in the control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的優先順序高於屬性。The property has precedence over the property. 每當設`true`、 使用預設系統密碼字元，以及所設定的任何字元會被忽略。Whenever the is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當是密碼模式中，因為， ，或是`true`、為限制模式。When the is in password mode because , , or is `true`, the is in restricted mode. 在此模式中，已停用，但目前快取，因此它可以還原如果萬一不受限制。In this mode, the is disabled, but the current is cached so that it can be restored if the ever becomes unrestricted. 切換是常見的案例。Toggling the is a common scenario. 控制項在受限制的模式時，會加上陰影。The is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode. 從設計工具的觀點來看，值顯示為實際值。From the designer perspective, the value shown is the actual value.
